EmailTemplate.name: 202104_Americas-EMEAI_ATR_Pilots_Webinar_Teams.1.Pilots Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Pilots Conference April 27
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join your Honeywell Flight Services Technical Team for a regional webinar covering the latest technical updates. Key topics for discussion:
- Honeywell Flight Technical Services â€“ Resources and Support - CPDLC Status/Update - Honeywell Performance Based Communication and Surveillance (PBCS) Tool - Business Aircraft Avionics Updates
- Pilatus - Gulfstream (Epic and NG FMS) - NZ-equipped Aircraft (Bombardier/ Embraer/ Dassault/ Hawker/ Gulfstream) - Dassault EASy - Embraer EJet/E2
DATE April 27th, 2021
TIME 5 - 6:00 AM PDT
LOCATION Microsoft Teams
HOSTED BY Honeywell
REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/04/emeai-pilots-webinar]]>
